name: Luxury_Bath_Accessory_Collection_Set
reviews: This item is worth the money. It is beautiful and has a huffy weight.
This Luxury Bath Accessory Collection set is gorgeous and looks beautiful in our new bathroom. They are well made and look so elegant in the bathroom.
Bought this set for my guest bathroom which has a lot of bling, and these go beautifully. Very substantial.
I wanted to use it as my bath trash can. Much to pretty for that!
Really nice and what I expected. Waste basket is very heavy
Very please with this Luxury bath collection. Quality seems to be good.
This was the perfect gift to my grandson
description:
Decorate your bathroom with the contemporary design of this luxury
bath accessory set. The metallic silver finish adds an elegant
touch to the cracked texture on the pieces, which enhances the
appeal of the collection. The set creates a sophisticated yet
modern look in your bathroom that elevates the ambiance of the
space.Choose between one lotion or soap dispenser, one soap dish,
  one toothbrush holder, one tumbler, one waste basket, one tissue
  holder and one three-piece towel set for a coordinated lookCracked texture pattern and metallic finish offers
  contemporary appealMade from polyester, poly-cotton and resin materialsLotion or soap dispenser measures 8 inches high x 3 inches
  wide x 2 inches deepSoap dish measures 1 inches high x 3 inches wide x 5 inches
  deepToothbrush holder measures 4 inches high x 2 inches wide x 5
  inches deepWaste basket measures 10 inches high x 6 inches wide x 10
  inches deepTissue holder measures 6 inches high x 6 inches wide x 6
  inches deepBath towel measures 48 inches high x 24 inches wide ; Hand
  towel measures 26 inches high x 16 inches wide ; Wash cloth
  measures 13 inches high x 13 inches wideLotion/soap dispenser: 8 inches x 3 inches x 2 inchesSoap dish: 1 inch x 3 inches x 5 inchesToothbrush holder: 4 inches x 2 inches x 5 inchesTumbler: 5 inches x 3 inches x 2 inchesWaste basket: 10 inches x 6 inches x 10 inchesTissue holder: 6 inches x 6 inches x 6 inches3-peice towel set: Bath towel: 48 inches x 24 inches; Hand
  towel: 26 inches x 16 inches; Wash cloth: 13 inches x 13
  inches                              StyleCasual, Contemporary, Modern, PatternedMaterialCeramic, ResinFinishSilver FinishPatternSolid Color, TexturedSet IncludeLotion/Soap Dispenser, Soap Dish, Tissue Holder, Toothbrush Holder, Tumbler, Waste BasketColorSilver
